subject: VAM
description_text:
Hi,

Will a single VAM unit be made available on AliExpress? I already have the
Simsonn pro plus and 1x VAM pro. I'd like to order a separate VAM unit but
cheaper postage through Ali.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Callum,  You can contact our sales representative on AliExpress — she will handle it for you personally.
